EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_East_Operators-Mechanics-Avionics_Webinar.Thank-you-for-attendin
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our Virtual Operator Conference, East Coast. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for attending our Virtual Operator Conference, East Coast.
This webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/Lu8LQ8zphwhsmBDdNinvtV]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 123789.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/Lu8LQ8zphwhsmBDdNinvtV]]>
